headline: Jefferies says market nears short term “peak RFK negativity", Vaccine makers up
summary: Investing.com -- Shares of Moderna Inc (BMV:MRNA) (NASDAQ:MRNA) were up roughly 7% at $41, while those of Pfizer Inc (NYSE:PFE)were up nearly 2%. Jefferies analysts said Investor sentiment around Moderna Inc could be nearing a short-term low, amid recent concerns tied to vaccine transparency and structural issues might start to ease.

headline: Moderna Stock Jumps Following Bullish Sales View at Healthcare Conference
summary: Moderna shares surged further Friday, a day after a senior executive made bullish comments at a healthcare conference about the vaccine maker's pipeline and cash position.

headline: Moderna's Fresh Blow As RFK Heads To HHS - A Tough 2025 May Be In Store
summary: Moderna, Inc.'s stock plummets as challenges mount, including vaccine skepticism, competitive pressures, and the RFK appointment. Click for my MRNA stock update.
